alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Brantley; Clinch; Coffee; Echols; Inland Camden; Jeff Davis; Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware; Wayne; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 9:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Gilchrist, central Bradford, northwestern Alachua, Columbia, Hamilton, northwestern Nassau, Baker, Union, Suwannee, northwestern Camden, Coffee, Pierce, Echols, Brantley, Clinch, Charlton, Atkinson, Ware, Bacon, southern Wayne, southwestern Jeff Davis and southern Appling Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 947 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Green to 7 miles west of Mayo. Movement was east at 85 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Lake City, Douglas, Live Oak, Jasper, Alma, Blackshear, Hilliard, Folkston and Homerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for northeastern Florida...and southeastern Georgia. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for northern and northeastern Florida.
